content:
What are the nutritional values and top 5 benefits of incorporating more fruits and vegetables into your diet while ensuring balanced nutrition? Please provide the data in [JSON data] format and the nutritional values in [Latex] code.
[{
    "name": "Spinach",
    "nutrients": {
        "protein": 2.9,
        "carbohydrate": 1.1,
        "fiber": 0.7,
        "vitaminA": 2813,
        "vitaminC": 14,
        "calcium": 99,
        "iron": 2.7
    },
    "benefits": [
        "Helps maintain healthy bones",
        "Promotes healthy digestion",
        "Improves brain function",
        "Strengthens immune system",
        "Reduces risk of chronic diseases"
    ]
}, {
    "name": "Blueberries",
    "nutrients": {
        "protein": 0.7,
        "carbohydrate": 14.5,
        "fiber": 2.4,
        "vitaminA": 54,
        "vitaminC": 14,
        "calcium": 6,
        "iron": 0.4
    },
    "benefits": [
        "Improves cognitive function",
        "Boosts heart health",
        "Reduces risk of chronic diseases",
        "Helps regulate blood sugar levels",
        "Reduces inflammation"
    ]
}, {
    "name": "Broccoli",
    "nutrients": {
        "protein": 2.8,
        "carbohydrate": 6.6,
        "fiber": 2.4,
        "vitaminA": 567,
        "vitaminC": 82,
        "calcium": 47,
        "iron": 0.7
    },
    "benefits": [
        "Improves bone health",
        "Supports healthy immune system",
        "Promotes healthy digestion",
        "Reduces risk of cancer",
        "Promotes healthy skin"
    ]
}, {
    "name": "Tomatoes",
    "nutrients": {
        "protein": 0.9,
        "carbohydrate": 3.9,
        "fiber": 1.2,
        "vitaminA": 833,
        "vitaminC": 40,
        "calcium": 18,
        "iron": 0.5
    },
    "benefits": [
        "Reduces risk of heart disease",
        "Helps maintain healthy skin",
        "Promotes healthy digestion",
        "Reduces risk of cancer",
        "Supports healthy vision"
    ]
}, {
    "name": "Carrots",
    "nutrients": {
        "protein": 0.9,
        "carbohydrate": 9.6,
        "fiber": 2.8,
        "vitaminA": 835,
        "vitaminC": 7,
        "calcium": 33,
        "iron": 0.6
    },
    "benefits": [
        "Improves eye health",
        "Supports healthy immune system",
        "Promotes healthy digestion",
        "Reduces risk of cancer",
        "Helps maintain healthy skin"
    ]
}]

- Carbohydrate: \(1.1 \, \text{g}\)
- Fiber: \(0.7 \, \text{g}\)

- Vitamin C: \(14 \, \text{mg}\)
